results.title: Metformin-Loaded PCL/PVA Fibrous Scaffold Preseeded with Human Endometrial Stem Cells for Effective Guided Bone Regeneration Membranes.
results.text_hl: Therefore, further in vivo studies were conducted using the electrospun @CHEMICAL_polycaprolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C016240 @@@PCL@@@/@CHEMICAL_Polyvinyl_Alcohol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011142 @@@PVA@@@ membrane containing @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ endometrial stem cells (hEnSCs) and 10% @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@. Histopathological and histomorphometric results confirmed that @CHEMICAL_polycaprolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C016240 @@@PCL@@@/@CHEMICAL_Polyvinyl_Alcohol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011142 @@@PVA@@@/hEnSCs/10 wt % @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ has excellent potential to differentiate hEnSCs into osteogenic lineages and bone regeneration in @<m>DISEASE_Calvarial_hyperostosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537963 @@@calvarial defects@@@ of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ebrahimi L, Farzin A, Ghasemi Y, Alizadeh A, Goodarzi A, Basiri A, Zahiri M, Monabati A, Ai J. Metformin-Loaded PCL/PVA Fibrous Scaffold Preseeded with Human Endometrial Stem Cells for Effective Guided Bone Regeneration Membranes. ACS Biomater Sci Eng. 2021 Jan 11;7(1):222-231. PMID: 33347290
